entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
